You can think of bitcoin as a spontaneously-managed start-up. Its capital is nodes & miners & it's financed by holders making the coins appreciate, which forces everyone to do what they want, which protects the integrity & scarcity of the ledger. Satoshi understood incentives!
Einstein said "If at first if an idea isn't absurd, then there is no hope for it." #Bitcoin was and still is considered absurd by many. Just another reason why I know we are going to $1,000,000.

The bitcoin start-up is completely open source. Anyone can read all its code & use it, try to change it, or invest in it. If you think it'll succeed, you'll think its token value will grow. Holding bitcoin is thus an entrepreneurial & investment decision like any other.
